title: If I mute everyone in game and type something, can they still see it or do they have to mute me?
body: Simple question, I'd like to disable all forms of chat in game smurfing a new account. If i mute every single person in game obviously i can't see what they type, but can they see what I type? IF I type anything?

replies.body: They can still see it unless they mute you as well
That's unfortunate, it'd be nice if there was an option to disable ALL chat.

You can disable /all chat, but unfortunately not ALL chat. outgoing messages to your teammates will still go through. You can however rebind your chat key from ENTER to something else more awkward or even remove it althogether: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/xdREFwll-how-to-easily-disable-your-enterchat-key-in-game-only

there is a way to disable all chat.

you can disable it in the UI
no, i mean chat in general, even for teammates.  When i said ALL chat, i meant ALLLLLL CHAT
you cant disable team chat. only mute it. why would you type in chat if you dont plan on talking in the first place?

There is a way to delete the file for the chatbox in the client files (googling a video can help) that will remove any means of seeing or sending chat. This doesn't apply for pre or post game chat however, and there is no guarantee that you won't be flagged for changing files, although it is harmless and doesn't give any advantages.
